sentences.sContent: The goblet was mantling with foam.
sentences.sCn: 这个高脚杯盖满了泡沫。

sentences.sContent: Suddenly, his friend saw the reflection of a snack swimming in the goblet.
sentences.sContent_eng: Suddenly, his friend saw the reflection of a snack swimming in the goblet.
sentences.sCn: 忽然，朋友看见酒杯里有条蛇影在游动。

sentences.sContent: "Yes . . . yes, this'll make it stop, " lied Harry. He tipped the contents of the goblet into Dumbledore's open mouth.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Yes . . . yes, this'll make it stop, " lied Harry. He tipped the contents of the goblet into Dumbledore's open mouth.
sentences.sCn: “好的……好的，这就让它停止。”哈利哄骗他说。又把酒杯里的液体灌进了邓布利多张开的嘴巴里。

trans.tranOther: a cup made of glass or metal, with a base and a stem but no handle
